analysis.description: FreezableToken.toKey (/unique_chucks/45/0x51a78394f5acccd32ea048b6e661553129accea7.sol#630-646) is declared view but contains assembly code

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/45/0x51a78394f5acccd32ea048b6e661553129accea7.sol:
	Contract Checkable has payable functions:
	 - check (/unique_chucks/45/0x51a78394f5acccd32ea048b6e661553129accea7.sol#1103-1112)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
empty in ERC223Token.transfer (/unique_chucks/45/0x51a78394f5acccd32ea048b6e661553129accea7.sol#898) is a local variable never initialiazed

TemplateCrowdsale.init (/unique_chucks/45/0x51a78394f5acccd32ea048b6e661553129accea7.sol#1204-1214) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-MainToken(token).mint(addresses[i],amounts[i]) (/unique_chucks/45/0x51a78394f5acccd32ea048b6e661553129accea7.sol)

TemplateCrowdsale.init has external calls inside a loop:
	- MainToken(token).mint(addresses[i],amounts[i]) (/unique_chucks/45/0x51a78394f5acccd32ea048b6e661553129accea7.sol)

TemplateCrowdsale.init has external calls inside a loop:
	- MainToken(token).mintAndFreeze(addresses[i],amounts[i],freezes[i]) (/unique_chucks/45/0x51a78394f5acccd32ea048b6e661553129accea7.sol)

Reentrancy in TemplateCrowdsale.init (/unique_chucks/45/0x51a78394f5acccd32ea048b6e661553129accea7.sol#1204-1214):
	External calls:
	- MainToken(token).pause() (/unique_chucks/45/0x51a78394f5acccd32ea048b6e661553129accea7.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- owner (/unique_chucks/45/0x51a78394f5acccd32ea048b6e661553129accea7.sol)

FreezableToken.releaseOnce (/unique_chucks/45/0x51a78394f5acccd32ea048b6e661553129accea7.sol#591-615) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(uint64(block.timestamp) > head) (/unique_chucks/45/0x51a78394f5acccd32ea048b6e661553129accea7.sol#598-601)

FreezableToken.releaseAll (/unique_chucks/45/0x51a78394f5acccd32ea048b6e661553129accea7.sol#619-630) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- release != 0 && block.timestamp > release (/unique_chucks/45/0x51a78394f5acccd32ea048b6e661553129accea7.sol#624-630)

FreezableToken.freeze (/unique_chucks/45/0x51a78394f5acccd32ea048b6e661553129accea7.sol#647-679) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(_until > block.timestamp) (/unique_chucks/45/0x51a78394f5acccd32ea048b6e661553129accea7.sol#651-654)
